pages.text: Ubricite Ingot can also be used to create Ubricite Armor, fully equipped, capable of $(t:Maximum 25 points)$(o)blocking an enemy's attack$() up to three times in a row and throwing them back a short distance. Sneak around while the enemy is attacking to use the armor's ability.
